question:
What do the snakes do...?
a.slither
b.move
c.walk
d.slide​

answers.answer:
A. SLITHER

Penjelasan

Slither: merayap atau melata(karena ular tidak mempunyai kaki)

Move: pindah

Walk: Berjalan ( gak ada kakinya)

Slide: meluncur (kurang tepat)

JADIKAN JAWABAN TERBAIK JIKA ANDA MERASA TERBANTU✨

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

maaf kalo salah

related_questions.question:
Mrs Ratih is teaching the student now. she is

TOLONG DI JAWAB YA, BUKAN DI TRANSLATE TIN YA​
Tigor and his family... the museum a.campong b. hiking c.visited d.swiming​

There____some cute cats on the sofa a. Am b. is c. are d. does
secepatnya ya​

answers.answer:
there are some cute cats on the sofa

Penjelasan:

c) are

====================================

C. Are

Pembahasan

Untuk benda yang hanya ada 1 atau tunggal kita menggunakan "There is" , Sedangkan benda yang lebih dari 1 atau jamak maka kita menggunakan "There are".

Maka di pertanyaan tersebut kita menggunakan "There are". Karena ada beberapa hewan atau pada teks tersebut dijelaskan "some cute cats on the sofa" yang artinya beberapa kucing lucu di sofa.

====================================

related_questions.question:
No    Plural
Meaning
1.
Bottle
2.
Sheep
3.
Cup
4.
Plate
5
Bowl
6
Liter
7.
Book
8.
Box
9.
Baby
10
Potato
11.
Dog
12.
Toy
13
Table
14.
Window
15.
Door
16.
Leaf
17.
Bus
18.
Watch
19.
Wife
20.
Woman​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Plural form

1. Bottle - Bottles

2. Sheep - Sheep

3. Cup - Cups

4. Plate - Plates

5. Bowl - Bowls

6. Liter - Liters

7. Book - Books

8. Box - Boxes

9. Baby - Babies

10. Potato - Potatoes

11. Dog - Dogs

12. Toy - Toys

13. Table - Tables

14. Window - Windows

15. Door - Doors

16. Leaf - Leaves

17. Bus - Buses

18. Watch - Watches

19. Wife - Wives

20. Woman - Women

Penjelasan:

Plural form adalah bentuk kata benda yang mempunyai jumlah lebih dari satu atau banyak. misalnya :

satu buku - dua buku = one book - two books

penambahan akhiran dengan huruf s atau es, contohnya : flower-flowers,box-boxes

ada beberapa yang berubah kata atau malah tetap, contohnya : Man-Men,Child-Children,Mouse-Mice

leaf-leaves, wife-wives,

hope you find this helpful ^•^

related_questions.question: Kk tolong di jawab sekarang ya mks​

This dialog is for question no 5.7    Sarah : Look, Mom brought us a kitten!
Oh my God, it's a Persian kitten. She is so cute,
Sarah
: Yes, I like her big eyes and chubby cheeks. Look at her legs, they are short!
Fia : I love her snub nose the most!
5. What animal is being described in the dialog?
A. Dog
D. Cat
C. Rabbit
B. Bird
6
The animal in the dialog above has ....
A small eyes
B. short legs
C. long nose
D. flat chee!
7. How do the speakers feel when they see the animal? They are
A. gloomy
B.calm
C.mad
D.glad​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

5. D. Cat

6. B. Short legs

7. D. Glad

Jawaban:

5. B. Cat

6. B. Short legs

7. D. Glad

related_questions.question:
8. I need an umbrella because. It is ...........right
now.​

11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^
